options.version_show: Show change log when Augmented Steam updates
options.excludef2p: Exclude free to play games from highlighting
options.contscroll: Enable continuous scrolling of search results
options.replace_account_name: Replace account name with community name
options.name: Name
options.showcomparelinks: Show "Compare" links for achievements on friend activity feed
options.hidetmsymbols: Trademark and Copyright symbols in game titles
options.hideactivelistings: Hide all active listings on Market homepage by default
options.clear: Are you sure you wish to reset all options? This cannot be undone.
options.profile_api_info: Show user API link on profiles
options.show_package_info: Show package info for all apps
options.wlbuttoncommunityapp: Show "Add to Wishlist" button on community app hubs
options.removeguideslanguagefilter: Don't automatically filter guides by user language
options.disablelinkfilter: Disable confirmation when accessing external sites
options.show_regionwarning: Show warning if browsing in non-account region
options.show1clickgoo: Show "1-Click turn into Gems..." button on applicable inventory items
options.hidedlcunownedgames: DLC for games you do not own
options.hidespamcomments: Hide spam comments from Workshop & profiles
options.hide_owned: Items you own in search results and tag pages
options.hide_ignored: Items you ignored in search results and tag pages
options.show_sysreqcheck: Show button to check system requirements on app pages (Experimental!)
options.es_bg: Set custom background on "Edit Profile" screen
options.total_spent: Show total spent on account page
options.add_to_cart_wishlist: Show "Add to Cart" button on Wishlists
options.quickinv: Show Quick Sale buttons on Steam Community items in inventory
options.library_f2p: Show played free to play games and demos in library
options.inventory_market_text: Show Market price on inventory page
options.send_age_info: Automatically send age verification when requested
options.store_steamcards: Show SteamCardExchange links on store pages
options.hide_owned_homepage: Items you own on the homepage
options.show_astatslink: Show AStats link on app pages
options.show_youtubegameplay: Show YouTube gameplay videos on app pages
options.show_youtubereviews: Show YouTube review videos on app pages
options.guest: Items you have a guest pass for
options.showallachievements: Show achievement stats on "All Games" page
options.steamrepapi: Show SteamRep status on profile pages
options.hide_early_access: Hide Early Access games on homepage, browse, and search pages
options.html5video: Show videos using HTML5 instead of Flash
options.showspeechsearch: Add speech input to search boxes
options.show_user_notes: Show user notes on wishlist and app pages
options.inventory_nav_text: Show advanced navigation on inventory page
options.carousel_description: Show app descriptions on storefront carousel
options.lowestprice_coupon: Include coupon codes in price comparison
options.show_languagewarning: Show warning if browsing in a language other than
options.purchase_dates: Show apps purchase date on store pages
options.show_badge_progress: Show apps badge progress on store pages
options.show_wishlist_link: Show a Wishlist link on profiles
options.show_wishlist_count: Show the number of items on Wishlist
options.profile_showcase_twitch: Add a showcase for Twitch.tv if there is a link
options.profile_showcase_twitch_profileonly: ... only if the link is in the Profile Summary

ready.failed: __amount__ request(s) failed, check browser console for more information

survey.users: __users__ users have completed the performance survey for this game
survey.gs_y: Has built-in graphic options or a graphics menu
survey.gs_n: Does not have built-in graphic options or a graphics menu
survey.nobody: Nobody has taken a performance survey for this game yet

wallet.custom_giftcard_amount: Select __input__ Custom Gift Card (any amount over __minamount__)

wsgf.unsupported: This score is awarded to games that have no __type__ support.  The game may be unplayable in __type__, or the image is stretched to fit the window.  Correct aspect ratio is not retained.
wsgf.gold: This medal is awarded to games which have received perfect scores from the WSGF for their __type__ support, and are __type__ Certified.
wsgf.silver: This medal is awarded to games that have received a calculated grade of B for their __type__ support.  All of these games are without major flaws, but have at least one blemish that prevents a perfect score.
wsgf.limited: This score is awarded to games that have received a calculated grade of C for their __type__ support.  All of these games have some level of __type__ support but have significant issues.

itad.option: Show menu option to sync data to IsThereAnyDeal.com
itad.sending: Loading your owned games and packages and sending them to IsThereAnyDeal.com

update.updated: Augmented Steam has been updated to __version__
update.changes: This release includes the following changes

register.owned: This Steam account already owns the product(s) contained in this offer.
register.notavail: Sorry, but this product is not available for purchase in this country.  Your product key has not been redeemed.
register.invalid: The product code you've entered is not valid.  Please double check to see if you've mistyped your key.
register.already: The product code you've entered has already been activated by a different Steam account.
register.dlc: The product code you've entered requires ownership of another product before activation.
register.wallet: The code you have entered is from a Steam Gift Card or Steam Wallet Code
register.toomany: There have been too many recent activation attempts from this account.  Please wait and try again later.
register.default: An unexpected error occurred.  Your product code has not been redeemed.  Please wait 30 minutes and try redeeming the code again.

queue.new_tooltip: Remove this product from your queue and start a new queue.
